title: Previous name
body:
Was wondering if there was a way to find out what the previous name was for this account/if a red could tell me the previous name of this account.

It's in my list of smurfs and the name must have been taken.

replies.body:
Just a suggestion, but could you check the email address it's linked to?
If you go to the account stuff you can get the linked email address.
It's an email that i no longer can get into.
In that case you may be able to try emailing support and just explaining it all to them :).
